m_szDocTitle: AUDI AG, BMW Group and Daimler AG agree with Nokia Corporation on joint acquisition of HERE digital
m_szDocSumamry: INGOLSTADT, MUNICH and STUTTGART, Germany, Aug. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  Acquisition will secure and strengthen HERE as an independent company serving customers from all industries Real-time maps and location based services will be the basis for the mobility of tomorrow Transaction expected to close in first quarter 2016 2015AUDI AG, the BMW Group and Daimler AG have agreed with Nokia Corporation that they will acquire its mapping and location services business HERE. The acquisition is intended to secure the long term availability of HERE's products and services as an open, independent and val
